name: Setter, Inc.
description: Provider of home services platform intended to help users take care of all their home maintenance and repairs. The company's platform offers concierge service for managing home maintenance such as plumbing, landscaping, pools, exterior, broken appliances, handyman, HVAC, masonry, roofing and electrical wiring repair, enabling users to avail a one point of contact for home maintenance & repair needs.
one_liner: Provider of home services platform intended to help users take care of all their home maintenance and repairs. The company's platform offers concierge service for managing home maintenance such as plumbing, landscaping, pools, exterior, broken appliances, handyman, HVAC, masonry, roofing and electrical wiring repair, enabling users to avail a one point of contact for home maintenance & repair needs.
